original: @171b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @171b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sv'a dh'ishth'a na kra ma m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
analyzed: sv'a dh'ishth'a na kra ma m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
translated: Svādhiṣṭhāna-kramāryatārāsādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The practice of Tārā with the stages of self-consecration

original: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ārya Tārā.

original: dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma gdan drangs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma gdan drangs te /
translated: First, one should invite the Bhagavatī with light rays from the syllable hūṃ on a sun seat in one's heart.

original: dpag tu med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
translated: Having made perfect offerings with immeasurable offerings, one should confess misdeeds and so forth.

original: stong ba nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnam pa sems kyis bsams te /
analyzed: stong ba nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnam pa sems kyis bsams te /
translated: After meditating on emptiness, one should imagine a crossed vajra with the mind.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa bsams la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa bsams la /
translated: From that transforming, one should imagine the vajra ground, vajra fence, and so forth.

original: de'i dbus su dpal ao di y'a na nga gi gnas gru gsum dmar po de'i dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa lte ba la h'um gis mtshan pa rnam par gnas pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su dpal ao di y'a na nga gi gnas gru gsum dmar po de'i dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa lte ba la h'um gis mtshan pa rnam par gnas pa /
translated: In the middle of that is the abode of glorious Oḍḍiyāna, a red triangle. In the middle of that is a five-pronged vajra standing on a sun, marked with hūṃ in the center.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las byang chub sems kyi gzugs bskal pa chen po'i me lta bu me stag gyen du 'bar ba zil gyis mi non pa'i gad rgyangs can /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las byang chub sems kyi gzugs bskal pa chen po'i me lta bu me stag gyen du 'bar ba zil gyis mi non pa'i gad rgyangs can /
translated: That completely transforms into the form of bodhicitta, like the fire at the time of the great eon, with sparks exploding upward, an unstoppable boisterous laugh,

original: zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bdud bzhi zil gyis yang dag par mnan pa /
analyzed: zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bdud bzhi zil gyis yang dag par mnan pa /
translated: with the left leg straight, fully pressing on the four māras,

original: phyag bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis pa /
translated: with twelve arms,

original: zhal drug pa /
analyzed: zhal drug pa /
translated: six faces,

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: and three eyes.

original: sku mdog dmar mo'o //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo'o //
translated: Her body is red.

original: g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig dang / @172a * //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig dang / @172a * //
translated: In her six right hands she holds a sword, a vajra cross, a single-pronged vajra,

original: dgra sta dang / mda' dang / gtun shing rnams bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: dgra sta dang / mda' dang / gtun shing rnams bsnams pa'o //
translated: an axe, an arrow, and a club.🔽In her six left hands she holds a skull, a bow, a chakram,🔽a lasso, a bell, and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: phyag g-yon pa rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i khab dang / rtse gsum dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i khab dang / rtse gsum dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams bsnams pa'o //
translated: In her left hands she holds a needle with a threatening forefinger, a trident, an ashoka branch, a bow, a noose, and a head of Brahma.

original: mi mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang bas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad brgyan pa /
analyzed: mi mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang bas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all the major and minor parts of the body, with a garland of human heads hanging down.

original: stag gi pags pa'i stod g-yogs can /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i stod g-yogs can /
translated: She wears an upper garment of tiger skin.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal dmar po /🔽dkar po dang / nag po ni g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal dmar po / dkar po dang / nag po ni g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis so //
translated: Her main face is red.🔽The two left faces are white and black.

original: ser po dang / nag po ni g-yas pa'i zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: ser po dang / nag po ni g-yas pa'i zhal gnyis so //
translated: The two right faces are yellow and black.

original: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o //
analyzed: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o //
translated: Above is a black face of a pig.

original: ljags 'dril zhing skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
analyzed: ljags 'dril zhing skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
translated: She has a curled tongue and tawny hair blazing upward.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
translated: She is crowned with Vairochana.

original: lag 'gro dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: lag 'gro dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with Rahu and bone ornaments.

original: rang gi 'od zer gyis bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
analyzed: rang gi 'od zer gyis bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
translated: Her own light completely conquers all maras.

original: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / pheem k'a ra dang / ha ha zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa /🔽dpal ldan ao di y'a na'i 'od zer can gyi bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed la mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga rnams su /
analyzed: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / pheem k'a ra dang / ha ha zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa / dpal ldan ao di y'a na'i 'od zer can gyi bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed la mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga rnams su /
translated: It is adorned with eight charnel grounds, surrounded by ḍākinīs dwelling in the ten directions, bhūtas, vetālas, and phaṇ̣ḍakas, who utter the terrifying sounds of “ha ha” and so forth.

original: aom a'a:h'um ngo //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um ngo //
translated: In an instant, generate yourself as glorious Uḍḍiyāna Tārā. In your head, throat, and heart, there are the syllables oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: yan lag thams cad la phat kyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad la phat kyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
translated: Imagine the syllable phaṭ on all your limbs.

original: de nas lte ba'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes la zla ba dang nyi ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i dbus su h'um yig las padma'i rtsa ba'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lte ba'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes la zla ba dang nyi ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i dbus su h'um yig las padma'i rtsa ba'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
translated: Above your navel, on a multicolored lotus, sun, and moon in union, is a multicolored hūṃ syllable, the nature of the lotus family.

original: aom badzra satve shva ri sarba dusht'an ha na ha na /
analyzed: aom badzra satve shva ri sarba dusht'an ha na ha na /
translated: oṃ vajra-sitātapatrā sarva-duṣṭān hana hana

original: da ha da ha /
analyzed: da ha da ha /
translated: daha daha

original: pa tsa pa tsa /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa /
translated: paca pacha

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ māri-cyai māṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: snying po'i sngags so //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags so //
translated: The essence mantra.

original: aom a'a:h'um bsgom pa'i sngags so //🔽aom badzra bi t'a l'i h'um phat bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um bsgom pa'i sngags so // aom badzra bi t'a l'i h'um phat bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: The meditation mantra.🔽The recitation mantra.

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee aom m'am h'um h'um phat phat gnyis pa'i bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee aom m'am h'um h'um phat phat gnyis pa'i bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: The second recitation mantra.🔽After that, the bali mantra in the four sessions is:🔽Oṃ ārallihoḥ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.🔽Oṃ vajra-dākinī samaya stvaṃ dṛśyahoḥ.

original: de'i rjes su thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma'i sngags ni aom a'a ralli ho dza:h'um bam ho:aom badzra d'a k'i n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho:kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunma da aa pasm'a ro d'a ki
analyzed: de'i rjes su thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma'i sngags ni aom a'a ralli ho dza:h'um bam ho:aom badzra d'a k'i n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho:kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunma da aa pasm'a ro d'a ki
translated: Kha kha khāhi khāhi sarva yakṣa-rākṣasa bhūta preta piśāca unamāda rocana.

original: n+y'a da ya ai dam ba lim grihna th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kra ma th'a ma h'a su kha bi briddha ye ma ma sa h'a yi ka bha ba tha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: n+y'a da ya ai dam ba lim grihna th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kra ma th'a ma h'a su kha bi briddha ye ma ma sa h'a yi ka bha ba tha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Unmada ḍākinya-dayādhimat pāliṃ gṛhṇātha pibatha mātrikrama mahāsukha-vividhayā mamasahāyikā bhavathā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zas la sogs pa la yang hr'i:yig gam h'um yig la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zas la sogs pa la yang hr'i:yig gam h'um yig la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la spyad par bya'o //
translated: Also, with the syllable hrīḥ or hūṃ, and so on, one should purify and enjoy food, and so on.

original: sku mdog dmar mo phyag bcu gnyis pa'i ao di y'a na'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo phyag bcu gnyis pa'i ao di y'a na'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The practice of Marichi of Oddiyana, the self-consecration stage of the red, twelve-armed Marichi, is complete.
